content:
Configuration Management

  • Introduce the notion of configurations

  • A configuration is one of the following:

    • A named set of resources based on a criteria
      • Version 5 of foo.doc and Version “Good” of bar.doc
      • The tip version of foo.doc and bar.doc
    • A named workspace (“big branch”) for resources that may be related to other workspaces
      • Beta2 which is derived from Beta1
